name: Ashish
text: Forge keeps improving with every release. It's now part of my daily workflow. Super useful.

name: Rahul
text: Forge set a strong example by enabling AI pair programming. Looking forward to similar support in Rust

name: Shouvik Ghosh,
text: Forge feels like pair programming with someone who actually understands my stack.

name: Hammond Pereira
text: This is absolutely amazing. I would genuinely love lifetime access to this platform.
The Muse + Forge combo works great it really helps validate plans before execution.
